闯: rush; break through; to temper oneself (by battling difficulties)
阴: cloudy (weather); yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang); secret; the moon; negative; shade
阵: short period; disposition of troops; wave
阻挠: thwart; to obstruct (something); stand in the way
附和: repeat an agreement; copy sb.'s action or words
陆地: land; dry land (as opposed to the sea)
陆续: in turn; successively; one after another
陈述: allegation; assertation; to declare; to state
除了: besides; except for; aside from; in addition to
陷入: sink into; get caught up in; land in (a predicament)
随便: as one pleases; informal; random; casual
随意: as one wishes; according to one's wishes
随着: along with; in the wake of
随身: carry on one's person; bring with one
隐瞒: conceal; hide; (a taboo subject); cover up the truth
隐蔽: conceal; hide; covert; under cover; Take cover!
难免: hard to avoid; difficult to escape from
难得: hard to come by; difficult to get; rare
难过: be grieved; be sad; have a hard time
难道: could it be that ...?; don't tell me ...
雌雄: male and female; winners and losers
雕塑: sculpture; a statue; a Buddhist image
雪上加霜: (literally) add frost to snow; one disaster after another; insult added to injury
需要: to need; to want; to demand
霸道: overbearing; despotic hegemony; rule by force; (of liquor, medicine, etc.) strong
青: blue; green; young (Kangxi radical 174); Qinghai province (abbr.)
非: non-; un-; not be; wrongdoing; simply must (Kangxi radical 175)
靠: depend on; lean on; near; to trust
靠拢: draw close; close up; move up
面临: be faced with; be up against
革命: revolution; revolutionary (politics); cause great social change; rise in revolt; take part in revolution
鞭炮: firecracker; a long string of small firecrackers
音响: (Electronic) speakers; acoustics; sound field (i.e., in a room or theater)
顶: top; roof; carry on one's head; prop up; to butt; (mw for headwear, i.e. hats)
项: nape (of the neck); sum (of money); mw item
顺便: conveniently; in passing; on the way
顺利: go smoothly; without a hitch; successful
顿: pause; arrange; stamp feet; suddenly; (mw for meals)
颁布: promulgate; to issue; publish (e.g a decree)
预习: (of students) prepare a lesson before class; preview
预订: place an order; book ahead; subscribe for
领先: leadership; to lead; be in front
颇: rather; quite; inclined to one side
颈椎: cervical vertebra; the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
颗: (mw for hearts and small, round things like seeds, grains, beans, etc.)
题: topic; subject; question on a test or assignment
飘扬: wave in the wind; flutter; fly
飞禽走兽: birds and animals; the beasts of the field and the birds of the air
首: head; chief; first; (mw for poems and songs) (Kangxi radical 185)
首先: first (of all); in the first place; firstly
驾驶: to drive; to pilot (a ship, an airplane, etc.)
骄傲: proud; arrogant; conceited; take pride in
验收: inspect and then accept (i.e. received goods
骑: to ride (an animal or bike); to sit astride
骚扰: harass; disturb; molest; cause a commotion
高档: top quality; first rate; high class
高潮: high tide; upsurge; climax; chorus (of a song)
鸦雀无声: not even a crow or sparrow can be heard (idiom); silence reigns
